snippet.title: Shortline Railroad gameplay (PC Game, 1992)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Shortline Railroad, Dos PC game produced by DOKA in 1992 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/shortline-railroad/5747/
Shortline Railroad is a nice game of strategy, business. You have to build railways and to make sure that does not happen discontinue or no collision between trains.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Transport Tycoon - https://youtu.be/2wH-RKk5Ck8
SimHealth - https://youtu.be/TEriYy1V5SE
Transport Tycoon Deluxe - https://youtu.be/paGwX4SntXw
